error_msg: You must specify the data configuration parameters.
description: Upload a .json file with your dataset or a .zip file with JSON files to be uploaded.

oneOf.description: Custom name to register your dataset. If no name is specified, the name of the uploaded file will be used.

oneOf.error_msg: Write the name of the key that constains the data.
oneOf.description: Name of key that contains the data in the JSON files.

oneOf.error_msg: The specified column name(s) is(are) not valid.
oneOf.description: Output column(s) of the dataset. By default, the last column is selected as output.
If your data has folders that define the splits select 'true', otherwise 'false'.

oneOf.error_msg: The size of the training set must be between 0 and 1.
oneOf.description: Percentage of the data that will be assigned to produce the training dataset (in the range 0 to 1, where 0 is 0% and 1 is 100%).

oneOf.error_msg: The test set size must be between 0 and 1.
oneOf.description: Percentage of the data that will be assigned to produce the test dataset (in the range 0 to 1, where 0 is 0% and 1 is 100%).

oneOf.error_msg: The validation set size must be between 0 and 1.
oneOf.description: Percentage of the data that will be assigned to produce the validation dataset (in the range 0 to 1, where 0 is 0% and 1 is 100%).

oneOf.error_msg: Shuffle should be true or false.
oneOf.description: This option indicates that the data will be randomly shuffled prior to generating the training, validation and test sets.

oneOf.error_msg: Must be an integer greater than or equal to 0.
oneOf.description: Positive integer that defines a randomness seed, which is a mechanism that allows to control randomness and make the results repeatable, even if within the same process there are random steps.
This option ensures that when dividing the dataset into train, test, and validation sets, the original distribution of labels in the input dataset will be preserved in each of the resulting datasets.
